metadata.title: FIS Learn - E-Learning Platform
metadata.description: Your gateway to quality online education. Learn from expert instructors and advance your career.

hero.title: Learn Without Limits
hero.subtitle: Access world-class courses from expert instructors. Start your learning journey today.
hero.courseDescription: Master the principles of user-centered design with Sarah Chen, Lead Designer at TechFlow.

expertInstructors.title: Expert Instructors
expertInstructors.description: Learn from industry professionals with real-world experience

flexibleLearning.title: Flexible Learning
flexibleLearning.description: Study at your own pace, anytime, anywhere

certificates.title: Recognized Certificates
certificates.description: Earn certificates to showcase your skills

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Join a community of learners and get help when you need it

courses.title: Explore Our Premium Courses
courses.subtitle: Master new skills with industry-leading instructors. From coding to design, find the perfect course to elevate your career.
courses.noResults: No courses found in this category.
courses.error: Failed to load courses. Please try again later.

cta.title: Ready to start your learning journey?
cta.subtitle: Join over 10,000 students achieving their goals with our expert-led courses.

ownPace.title: Learn at Your Own Pace
ownPace.description: Life gets busy. That's why our courses are on-demand and self-paced. Pause, rewind, and rewatch as many times as you need to master the material.

mentorship.title: Expert Mentorship & Feedback
mentorship.description: Don't learn in a vacuum. Get personalized feedback on your code and designs from industry veterans who have walked the path before you.

projectBased.title: Project-Based Curriculum
projectBased.description: Theory is important, but practice is everything. Build real-world projects that you can add to your portfolio and show off to future employers.

testimonials.title: Loved by Students
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our community has to say about their learning experience.

alex.content: The best investment I've made in my career. The project-based approach helped me build a portfolio that got me hired at a top tech company.
alex.author: Alex Johnson

maria.content: I was stuck in tutorial hell for months until I found this platform. The mentorship and structured learning paths gave me the direction I needed.
maria.author: Maria Garcia

david.content: The quality of instruction is unmatched. Complex concepts are broken down into digestible lessons. Highly recommended for anyone serious about coding.
david.author: David Chen

footer.tagline: Empowering learners worldwide with quality online education.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We're here to help you on your learning journey.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll help you get started.
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
form.replyNote: We typically reply in under 24 hours.
form.successMessage: Thanks for reaching out, {name}! We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I enroll in a course?
faq.a1: Simply create an account, browse our courses, and click "Enroll" on any course you're interested in.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid courses.
faq.a3: Yes, all courses include a certificate of completion that you can share on LinkedIn.
faq.a4: Yes, we have enterprise plans for teams and organizations. Contact us for details.

help.title: Still need help?
help.subtitle: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

hero.title: We're building the future of learning
hero.subtitle: FIS Learn connects passionate experts with eager learners. We are on a mission to democratize access to high-quality education globally.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower individuals worldwide with the knowledge and skills they need to achieve their personal and professional goals. We believe education is the fundamental right that unlocks human potential.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted online learning platform, creating a future where anyone, anywhere can learn anything from the best instructors.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our decisions and shape our culture

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for world-class quality in every course, feature, and interaction.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We are driven by a genuine love for education and student success.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster a supportive environment where learners connect and grow together.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We build for everyone, ensuring education is accessible across borders.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and an unwavering commitment to ethics.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what online learning can look like.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From a small idea to a global community

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.description: FIS Learn starts with a vision to democratize education.

2021.title: Rapid Growth
2021.description: Reached 10,000 students and launched our first 100 courses.

2022.title: Going Global
2022.description: Expanded fast, welcoming learners from over 50 countries.

2023.title: Innovation Award
2023.description: Recognized as the 'Best New EdTech Platform' by TechWeekly.

2024.title: AI Integration
2024.description: Launched personalized AI tutors for every student.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The passionate people behind FIS Learn

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.bio: Former educator with 15+ years of experience in online learning.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.bio: Tech leader passionate about building scalable learning platforms.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.bio: Curriculum expert focused on creating engaging learning experiences.

david.name: David Kim
david.bio: Operations specialist ensuring smooth platform performance.

cta.title: Want to join our mission?
cta.subtitle: We are always looking for passionate individuals to join our team. Check out our open positions or become an instructor.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Insights and resources for proactive learners

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get the latest articles and resources delivered straight to your inbox.
